column4: At boot FATAL could not load /lib/modules/2.6.35-23-generic/modules.dep no such file or directory then hangs

ok..
@Ikonia so can you help
At boot error message "FATAL could not load /lib/modules/2.6.35-23-generic/modules.dep no such file or directory" then hangs..
I cannot go pass boot process so cannot login..
just curious, what did you change (install/remove) just before you started getting this error?
just curious, what did you change (install/remove) just before you started getting this error?
i upgraded from ubuntu 10.04 to 10.10
like sacarlson said, can you boot into a different kernel version?
i have  tried that but still not working
have you tried the recovery mode (though not sure that this will work either)...
my mouse and networking wouldn't work
yes but can you login in recovery mode?
yes i can
your kernel wasn't installed properly. specifically, your kernel modules were either not compiled or they have not been set in the modules.
please how do i fix this?

this is not exactly a solution. i suggest that you make a backup of your /home folder and /var/cache/apt/archive folder. then you must reinstall ubuntu 10.10. make sure you create a seperate /home partition
WOW. Please is there anyother way i can fix this without reinstalling.. because i do not want to lose any files and configuration
the other way is this - http://www.cyberciti.biz/tips/compiling-linux-kernel-module.html
